w23b4u5qwp.name: Northpoint City, Lift Lobby B
w23b4u5qwp.directions:
1) Face Poh Kim DVD library at Basement 2, turn left and walk towards the carpark. Enter carpark and head towards C6 parking lot. Musollah will be visible from there.

2) At Basement 1 near Beauty Language and Spectacle Hut, head towards lift lobby B and take travellator down. The musollah will be located beneath the travellator.
w23b4u5qwp.provision: Praying Mats, Telekung, Qiblat Indicator, Air Conditioned
w23b4u5qwp.remarks:
1030 - 2230hrs

Maximum capacity is 4 for jemaah prayers.

w23b4u50ux.name: NorthPoint City B2 Musollah
w23b4u50ux.directions:
Find Lift Lobby B in the North Wing (find direction towards National Library Board (NLB)). Go to Level B2.

Perform wudhu at Level B1. From Musollah, walk straight towards the escalator, go up to level B1. Walk straight and there will be handicap, male and female toilets.
w23b4u50ux.provision: Slippers, Praying Mats, Telekung, Qiblat Indicator
w23b4u50ux.remarks: Musollah is very small. Expect to wait awhile as there will sure be people performing prayers. Musollah is a little difficult to locate unless you are familiar with the shopping mall.
